rbfFormatter.maxCharsInArgsReinitBucket.description: Variable allowing to choose the maximum length of a keyword / arguments ... (sequence of words separated by one space max) in a line. Then format the line to the minimum in size. The following lines in test or kw are based on the formatting of this line. To "deactivate" this operating mode, enter a high value (1000).

rbfFormatter.maxCharsInArgsKeepBucket.description: Variable allowing to choose the maximum length of a keyword / arguments ... (sequence of words separated by one space max) in a line. Then format the line to the minimum in size. The following lines in test or kw are based on the formatting of preceding lines. To "deactivate" this operating mode, enter a high value (1000).

rbfFormatter.maxArgsInKwLineKeepBucket.description: Variable allowing to choose the maximum number of keyword and arguments ... (sequence of words separated by one space max) in a line. Then format the line to the minimum in size. The following lines in test or kw are based on the formatting of this line. To "deactivate" this operating mode, enter a high value (1000).

rbfFormatter.maxArgsInKwLineReinitBucket.description: Variable allowing to choose the maximum number of keyword and arguments ... (sequence of words separated by one space max) in a line. Then format the line to the minimum in size. The following lines in test or kw are based on the formatting of preceding lines. To "deactivate" this operating mode, enter a high value (1000).

rbfFormatter.interIndent.description: Variable allowing to choose the indentation of the whole robot page, you have to put at least two spaces for robotFramework to be functional.
